abstracts.cdata!:
The principal objectives of the proposed
            project are to help RNCFM to renew and modernize its
            facilities, improve the reliability and efficiency of its
            operations and improve its financial management and
            accounting methods. The project components are: (a) track
            renewal and improvement; renewal of points, crossings and
            procurement of track maintenance equipment and tools; (b)
            replacement of seven line locomotives; (c) replacement of
            new acquisition of railcars, coaches and wagons; (d)
            improvement of telecommunications; (e) replacement of
            workshop equipment; and (f) improvement of the
            railway's financial management and accounting system;
            implementation of its new Transport Plan, and carrying out
            of studies concerning the long-term viability of
            Antsirabe-Antananarivo and Manakara-Fianarantsoa lines, with
            the help of consultants.
